e77d700fe59c19b6.voiceContent: It's because I always have this ultra-serious look on my face, and it stresses out the other matra.

520cf2cd6d684411.voiceContent: Don't worry, I feel much more relaxed now than I was at the Akademiya.

e9ff63278e61e1e8.voiceContent: Any plans today? If there's anything you need help with, just let me know.

4193eb06111395f8.voiceContent: You have to keep playing if you want to maintain a good win rate. Otherwise, you'll be caught off guard by new and upcoming strategies.

979a8b238c1d0ea8.voiceContent: In most cases, I couldn't understand them, and they couldn't seem to understand me, either.

b2b74e1c1ac6a79d.voiceContent: Then everyone else started laughing. Even though they were all saying that my jokes weren't funny, I could tell that I had lightened the mood.

c35144fdcdb3b379.voiceContent: By the time I got back, I realized that my deck was already out of the meta, and I kept losing game after game. Eventually, I made some adjustments and finally started turning things around.

02e4e20ce160d6e3.voiceContent: Besides... if I tell lots of jokes, not ALL of them can be bad, surely.

1f5438b4cce1fd4c.voiceContent: When you're trying to get to sleep, it's so quiet and peaceful that you almost start wondering whether it's even real... which makes it hard to relax.

d3fc0b020d6101e4.voiceContent: Really? Are you up for a game then?

d04f98d5b0c82690.voiceContent: The point of rest is to relieve the stress and fatigue you've built up, it doesn't mean completely changing who you are.

8e3852abee7e711d.voiceContent: There's no howling desert wind or sound of bugs skittering in the rainforest.

55ef44f9ca2e7875.voiceContent: I never go easy on anyone. Just play your best.

08bdee3995d0214d.voiceContent: It's really hard for me to tell what jokes someone might find funny.

4ad57463581a4300.voiceContent: Why did the Sumpter Beast cross the road while burdened with heavy goods? To get to Sumeru's Most Sumptuous Sumpter Beast bodybuilding competition.

05697b278fff001c.voiceContent: So once I started playing Genius Invokation TCG, I wanted to use it as a way to take my mind off other things. You know, as a way to help me relax.

33ee07557cfbf4ee.voiceContent: I'll help walk you through the game once we're finished.

f414e24aa2c6e667.voiceContent: Sure, I'll even tell you a couple of jokes.

cf6be6f05ffb7b12.voiceContent: But Genius Invokation is different. I can always clearly discern what my opponent is thinking.

554c3013e97db99a.voiceContent: I just need to stick to it, and I know that one of them will land... someday.

a57786d420641b62.voiceContent: I was on a dangerous mission and didn't have any time to sit down and play.

5016f8cd15c073ab.voiceContent: No, not really. The longest I've ever gone without playing was 20 days.

530d16f501676d16.voiceContent: The first time I played, I just saw it as a game to pass the time.

82a6d0302bf8b04a.voiceContent: Here's another one. Which creature has the worst personal hygiene in all of Teyvat? Cryo Slimes. Why? Because they always bounce on top of the water, and never go in for a bath.

30cd34a3bd35831a.voiceContent: At first, I couldn't get used to how quiet it is here.

7e3ad33b8768257d.voiceContent: Sleep well. Everything else can wait until tomorrow.

8068771143e3a986.voiceContent: ...But now, it is much more than just a game to me.

0225d9090083d56f.voiceContent: In my previous work, I punished many criminals who had broken the rules and had to listen to their constant complaining.

408f520669ae9b1f.voiceContent: One time, it hit me that I should try telling a couple of jokes. So I gave it my best shot, and the room fell completely silent, with everyone just staring at me. But then, after a few moments, someone started laughing and said you call that a joke!?

a5a186be36e74f77.voiceContent: Yes. I just tell myself that I'm on a vacation and that I shouldn't worry about what's going on anywhere else.

f0aca51a102fefe9.voiceContent: And it's not just criminals. Even with your friends, there are bound to be some topics where you are unable to understand one another.

b91b552666dd9b38.voiceContent: Be sure to get ample rest before your next adventure.

744d951eb19b74ad.voiceContent: As a matra, your heart is like a bowstring... It cannot become too slack, but it cannot be too taut, either. Otherwise, it could snap without warning at any time.

207e24c67763fb6e.voiceContent: Though, of course, before bed every night I still reflect on my previous battles and review what I've learned.

00dc78edf97944ff.voiceContent: Yes. Is that strange? You have a funny look on your face.

a6a16ae5cae60b34.voiceContent: Now that I think about it, it's been all of five days since I last played a game of Genius Invokation TCG.

43d33424f92a33cc.voiceContent: So I thought, even if the jokes aren't funny, at least telling them can still help the others around me feel more at ease.

042e0227e86afa53.voiceContent: You don't find that funny at all?

2435b5335902607a.voiceContent: Just calm your mind and breathe steadily, you'll fall right asleep. I'll be sure to wake you up in the morning. Goodnight.

516058e81ccb045b.voiceContent: Their hunger for victory, their confidence in the deck, their passion for the game... Many can hide their strategy, but few can conceal these emotions.

3df0765917330adb.voiceContent: I really like it here. It's a place where I can finally enjoy a moment of peace. I'll use this time to revitalize myself and prepare for the next time I need to administer judgment.

5489b10d02c6f4af.voiceContent: Good morning, you look like you're ready and raring to go.

cd9f97d443cbe390.voiceContent: Good. Each book is neatly in its place.

1dce23c50a67b86e.voiceContent: Wait, are some of them crooked? I must correct this at once...

a2f185bcc9eb0c77.voiceContent: The spines are facing out, books with a similar theme are grouped together, and there's not a single banned volume to be seen.

4adf33979a8d79de.voiceContent: It was an unfamiliar experience at first, but I got used to it. ...Looking back now, I can hardly believe how long I've been with the matra.

f8aed590929fbde7.voiceContent: I travel a lot for work. Sometimes, I have to camp or lodge in a village.

4f6f67a947f31a80.voiceContent: Resting here brings back a lot of memories.

6952ba8725b25c6d.voiceContent: We interrogated the people in charge of the caravan on the day of the incident...

fefe8ca1b17b0efe.voiceContent: But, they were technically the victims of the case, and all their goods were lost, so there was no evidence to investigate.

aed140b0eae15a20.voiceContent: We contacted the original seller of the gem. Apparently, he sold the other half to a young man in the desert, but that's all he could tell us.

5810ae98358dfc87.voiceContent: Their goods are certainly suspicious, but until we recover them, all we can do is to observe the caravan under the guise of protection.

48831e358cbc376b.voiceContent: Tighnari, can you stay back and explain the situation to everyone when they arrive?

fdd4a09006f910dc.voiceContent: But, I was told she had left first thing this morning.

da6bd4f81542e4cd.voiceContent: Alright, let's leave through the north gate and see what we can find.

759535185b9f7a81.voiceContent: Was she by herself? And did you happen to see which gate she used to leave the city?

d5dbe8e667ddbdd3.voiceContent: Mr. Zubayr, could you send word to Pardis Dhyai if Nilou comes back to the Grand Bazaar?

1c835b21d78d0680.voiceContent: ...So, the complete opposite direction of Pardis Dhyai.

17f327102a2765de.voiceContent: Let's start with the Grand Bazaar. We should ask around for clues.

3e4d52cbdd68d9d9.voiceContent: You know this red floating being?

79ba8698b457ba8b.voiceContent: Now's not the time for riddles. Everyone in the city is still worried about Nilou.

bc8ff8d420c8bc58.voiceContent: A Wedjat Eye, Pari... Sounds like something I've read about before...

d77e6808def992fa.voiceContent: He drank plenty of water before the bout, so he should be fine...

7badbd81a3fbe822.voiceContent: (Once dinner's over, I'll tell them the joke I came up with yesterday.)

8b73a029636ff471.voiceContent: It's easy to get mixed up with this many footprints. We need to be thorough.

87979b318b5afd8a.voiceContent: Don't worry. I'll find them before things escalate that far.

0c83cd294aaebd93.voiceContent: But if you still feel uneasy, then why don't you tell me about anyone else you know who was involved. The more information I have, the safer you will be.

ca3209388f051cf2.voiceContent: Was there anyone following her? Did everything look okay?

fbf7e73f8538c3d5.voiceContent: Miss Nevida, have you seen Nilou this morning?

497e736684d55321.voiceContent: An alarm! Yes, that's what I heard just now. Dear friends, a critical moment has arrived...

ef43655e56421a7e.voiceContent: On that topic, I wonder how much it's worth...

9f16196d8fa865a0.voiceContent: It is time... to come together... and play Genius In—

bb45356371f49128.voiceContent: Excuse me, have any of you seen Miss Nilou from Zubayr Theater come this way?

a413215129bb2c06.voiceContent: ...Understood. If she comes back this way, tell her to find me at Pardis Dhyai.

25d08348e65b57ef.voiceContent: Did you see the man's face?

2970c85cf8431d56.voiceContent: Where did you get this information?

7875383c145ca1a2.voiceContent: Hmm... Let's head towards the ruins for now. The vision could mean we're on the right track.

d2e65644431d85c5.voiceContent: Was Nilou one of the voices?

1612bd95146a9cb3.voiceContent: I don't think she can hear us. We're too far away.

a241757d42de46bb.voiceContent: On a different note, do you have any other plans for the day?

e7e9995ac9f30875.voiceContent: You think so? Then, tell me your secret!

1ce80385832d4872.voiceContent: ...Strange. Sounds like you're hiding something from me.

7f25c5bd7abe894e.voiceContent: Get it? Like the color... I can explain it if you need.

b1cf05dfebb00cd7.voiceContent: Well, find any clues? They say the proof is in the pudding, after all.

803f37d8f5aa102c.voiceContent: Just doing my duty. By the way, I brought something that I think might help with the investigation. Here, have some Padisarah Pudding.

b2f8f1f196320af1.voiceContent: ...I see, so you and Candace already did a preliminary investigation.

6288540608370b10.voiceContent: Oh, and these are the items I was supposed to get. Could you take them back with you?

c1bccfb90d9a442a.voiceContent: Because... they're always going to be read straight through.

f3166dc003725fad.voiceContent: Do you know why Henna Berries can't tell a lie?

313b97f9d991ed70.voiceContent: Alright, you can leave the rest to me.

951e33c7e8e0bffa.voiceContent: Oh? And what things would those be? Sounds like something the General Mahamatra should know about.

e445adfdc4d72891.voiceContent: Well, with that resolved, could you tell the group I've got a case?

7eb27d7da0fd9c85.voiceContent: Well, once you told me about the case, I realized I might not make it this afternoon. I was going to ask you to tell the group, but you decided to end the conversation.

352df3e9c5bc8260.voiceContent: Is that so? You're not afraid of ending up like the bass in the lake?

e2fd4de2bdce4be1.voiceContent: Because, they always wind up eating their worms.

37da41ee8e5633f7.voiceContent: I would hope so. I just handed it to you.

ef2351d0174684fd.voiceContent: I'm here on business, investigating an unusual robbery case.

5a974b87b728be03.voiceContent: But, when I asked about their plans this afternoon, they started dodging my questions.

f0431da242f1716c.voiceContent: But, when I asked about their plans this afternoon, they started dodging my questions.

3011a3e82f0fe1ce.voiceContent: Anyway, back to the matter at hand. Tell me about this robbery case of yours.

eabd82b790fec847.voiceContent: With this many traces, it's easy to get mixed up. Let me take a closer look...

417e14d0465225e0.voiceContent: Sure. We'll continue analyzing the footprints over here.

919eeb32d86616d7.voiceContent: But, the Wedjat Eye was lost after the cataclysm in Khaenri'ah, buried deep beneath the sands.

cef3372303fc8efd.voiceContent: It was a gift from King Deshret to Lesser Lord Kusanali.

0fe1893b1bc5ebce.voiceContent: I'll tell the other matra to keep an eye out for that caravan. If we find any evidence of any misconduct, we won't let them off lightly.

600f1d2be2601a2c.voiceContent: I only know the basics. I never thought these two gems could be connected to the relic from the legend.

74ee191ad596c9fa.voiceContent: That would explain why they chose a remote path away from Aaru Village. They're lucky you didn't catch them in the act...

102f2ab1ade24b0e.voiceContent: Don't worry, you'll be safe with me.

cc9a8b446aeb6ad7.voiceContent: Your sins weigh upon your soul.

7047fdf19ecb55b6.voiceContent: Wealth is the foundation on which civilization is built.

644fc3563422c7d0.voiceContent: Fall back. Don't try to act tough.

523ef2b65dd2b7a2.voiceContent: In death... a new cycle begins...

6415b3d5cddc5814.voiceContent: I'm Cyno, the former General Mahamatra. Now I use my abilities to punish evil as I see fit. If you share my devotion to rules and justice, then I can lend you my strength.

6626aa8c6f9d665e.voiceContent: Good deeds and bad... In the end, all will be placed upon the scales.

c3c8b894a1157b01.voiceContent: Luck can swing the results of a single game, but it's bound to run out sooner or later.

6ab6de9e1d030700.voiceContent: I do try to lighten the mood sometimes, but... I'm not the best judge of other people's sense of humor.

1dad1883113b5aeb.voiceContent: In some legends, thunderbolts are a form of judgment from the gods above.

581f8f4531cdff6e.voiceContent: Careful, the wind is picking up.

a5c98bd47db9e6bf.voiceContent: I love seeing everything covered in a fresh blanket of snow. There's a perfect stillness to it that's not lifeless, but calm and peaceful.

96cb2dca2e00d62a.voiceContent: The sunshine will eventually illuminate every hidden corner.

db459794af116412.voiceContent: Get ready. It's time to go.

83a9826f675061ce.voiceContent: Want me to prepare lunch today? It's fine with me, but I should warn you, I can't promise it'll be any good.

e218470cddb7c7d8.voiceContent: Remember what I told you? There's always danger lurking in the night, so whatever you do, keep your guard up.

f7b330411b385188.voiceContent: Goodnight. Now, there's some criminal activity nearby that I'll go deal with.

7fec3836fc479a6f.voiceContent: Hmm... a joke? Ah, I've got just the one. Ahem... There once was a traveler, stranded in the desert and dying of thirst, who in desperation prayed for a Hydro Slime to come their way. But the traveler didn't realize that at that very moment, a starving Hydro Slime was praying to meet a lone, stranded traveler... What, not funny? Tsk, I think it's hysterical.

d1af374ed7d56d61.voiceContent: Sometimes I'll take a stroll through the desert at night... The cold, dry air out there helps me clear my mind.

1bf33c9088d87818.voiceContent: The past cannot be changed, and the future cannot be foretold. As a result, I make sure to always cherish the here and now.

7418ea36cbb30135.voiceContent: Up for a game of Genius Invokation TCG? I'll show you the new deck I built.

fe7842724429411f.voiceContent: You may say that I have received much divine favor, with the spirit that dwells within me, and the god that took heed of my ambition. But I have no intention of letting this affect my code of justice. I will simply continue to do whatever is required to fulfill my duty.

0f73c5bf766fe900.voiceContent: I think most people understand that an excess of desire will lead to disaster, but people seldom admit that when it comes to the pursuit of knowledge, they're only willing to put it in a positive light. In my opinion, chasing after knowledge is still a form of desire, and must also be reined in.

7747917f73c16262.voiceContent: I'm fond of the shrubs that grow in the desert. The desert is a symbol of repose and solitude, and all civilizations will eventually be buried by a sandstorm. But despite these desolate conditions, there are still signs of growth. Sometimes, I really find myself impressed by their tenacity.

0b7c01d957ba167b.voiceContent: Tighnari is different from other scholars I've met. He has the same wholehearted dedication to knowledge, but he will never cross the most important boundaries. Some scholars see themselves as gods within their own laboratories, but not Tighnari — he has always shown the same respect for every form of life. I've heard that he even declined a position in the Akademiya, and I support his decision.

35f533f0d16f4784.voiceContent: Tighnari once told me not to tell jokes at the dinner table, insisting that my jokes weren't funny at all. I did not share his opinion, so I told three of my best jokes in a row, and explained the premise of each in great detail. By the time I was done talking, my food was cold.

e231f0314a14b073.voiceContent: I once helped Collei seal away the god's remains in her body, but the process was an unthinkably painful one. To many, enduring that kind of pain would be a prospect more terrifying than death, so it was very admirable that she was able to persevere through it all.

6a7e4503ae152d6c.voiceContent: I can sense her enthusiasm and passion for dancing — it has become an integral part of her being. I hope that she will always be able to use the art she loves to bring happiness to other people.

e51492adb801354e.voiceContent: I've carefully browsed through the case files regarding Faruzan's disappearance. At the time, I thought maybe she had been conducting some kind of dangerous research, but once I met her in person, I completely abandoned that idea. Though it might be a little hard for me to get along with her, she mostly reminds me of a kindly and chatty parent. She is considerate of others, and would never do anything imprudent.

c1d7043d7e1a515c.voiceContent: Of course I know about Lisa, we once both studied under the same sage. As General Mahamatra, I've seen many tragedies befall those seeking knowledge too assiduously, so it's easy for me to understand her decision.

7b2d41792f3345d0.voiceContent: I don't really like people who are too smart. They think they can control everything, and constantly venture to the fringes of danger. But Alhaitham is one of the more reliable ones. In most cases, he is actually in control of things and has the ability to avert potential disaster.

67e44e4807d7dc1c.voiceContent: Tighnari and Collei never said it to my face, but they found Kaveh's personal anecdotes far more entertaining than the jokes I had prepared... I could see it on their faces. Hmm? What did I think about that? Well, I thought it was funny that they could laugh at such a situation.

a1a4b47beb0661a6.voiceContent: Commenting on a god might be overstepping my position a little... But when I was working with her, I personally witnessed her wisdom, courage, and determination. Compared with those sages who constantly undermined and criticized her without a shred of evidence, I think I can provide a more reliable assessment She is an exceptional deity who is worthy of everyone's respect.

36dc0158f23a3472.voiceContent: Huh? You want to know more about me? Hm, I suppose many people see me as a thorn in their side... But don't worry, as long as you don't do anything dangerous, you won't have any trouble with me.

68a1df5fe86ddb55.voiceContent: With my body as a vessel, I can harness the power of the spirit that dwells within me. This is possible in part due to my natural constitution, but also due to a deal I willingly made in the past. There's no reason to shy away from the topic. If I am to weigh the souls of others in this world as a matra, then I must also place my own soul on the scales to be judged in the same manner.

e6ada5682b9eb1c4.voiceContent: Rather than thinking about the why of things, I prefer to focus on what has been done. There are countless reasons why people do things in this world, and upon hearing some of those reasons, you can't help but start to feel that the wrongdoer had a point, or that the public is being too harsh on them. The disadvantaged side will always garner people's sympathy, but the judge must abandon all such feelings. We may empathize with the pain and motivations of the accused, but a crime, once committed, cannot be left unpunished.

6994f37192c0dacf.voiceContent: In the gloomy sea of ignorance, a faint glimmer of light will occasionally appear, luring those who do not understand the truth toward it. People will often see that glimmer as a beacon to guide their way, but in doing so overlook the great dangers still lurking in the pitch-black waters. Steering those who have long resided in darkness away from the light is a cruel thing in itself, but I must continue to do so until we can finally defeat the enemies that lay hidden beneath the water's surface.

e7d79179d620afe6.voiceContent: I've already told you everything that I think is worth sharing. What else could you possibly want to hear from me? Heh, your curiosity is remarkable... Alright, let's hear your questions. For someone who is used to interrogating others, the feeling of being questioned is... interesting.

a8e9312641387e4e.voiceContent: In my free time, I like to play Genius Invokation TCG with other people. Being able to express so much creativity and variation within a working rule set makes it more than just a game — it's an art form.

39f654e7343d28b3.voiceContent: Just recently, I saw a light novel from Inazuma based on Genius Invokation TCG. When the main character found themselves in a rough spot, they somehow drew a card that wasn't even supposed to exist. This shook me to the core, and presented me with a great conundrum Through directly manipulating the deck, they were able to pull off a miracle that nobody could have expected. The question is... should it be seen as breaking the rules, or is this, too, ultimately within the rules of the game?

76127d1ab0de0533.voiceContent: The rations I take with me when traveling through the desert are usually completely tasteless. Once you've eaten enough of those, you'll be grateful for just about anything with some flavor. If I had to pick something, though... I wouldn't say I relish eating bugs or anything bug-related...

428df49b5a3c613e.voiceContent: Tastes great. You have my gratitude.

c241a300745a75c8.voiceContent: Agh... This is for me? ...Are you sure?

9702b1537de3e85d.voiceContent: Ahem... I'd like to wish you a happy birthday. Though I don't have much experience with celebrations, once I realized your birthday was coming, I decided to make some preparations. First, I have this deck for you that I worked on for a few days, I think it'll really suit your style. Also, I adjusted my schedule to open up some time, so is there anywhere you'd like to go? I'd be happy to accompany you. A birthday only lasts a day, but you should take the chance to really enjoy it. Just make sure we can be back within three days.

a9295659cc2b139d.voiceContent: I can feel new power surging within me, a testament to my growth.

4bbe38519ae2259a.voiceContent: I vow to uphold the rules and punish evil.

eb409c838e74c910.voiceContent: My strength has reached its peak, but there are still many things I can never accomplish relying on my fighting power alone. There will still be many times when emotions and rules do not agree, but I think I'll find the key to striking the right balance in the journeys to come.

5cf1159797f67651.voiceContent: Sethos has a strong sense of responsibility. I have the utmost respect for his skill as a warrior, and I admire his courage. He's also been a great help to me personally, and I'm sure that cooperation between the Akademiya and the Temple of Silence will go very smoothly with him leading the Temple.Nevertheless, he does have one flaw — he doesn't play nearly enough Genius Invokation TCG for my liking. Every time I invite him to play, he's either busy with work, about to go out for a meal, or has existing plans with other friends... Excuses, all of them! Are we not his best friends in all of Sumeru City?

ae6718cbbf1ed027.voiceContent: Rice, meat, and dried nuts, mixed with some yogurt and roasted together... what a wonderful mix of flavors. You can feel the aroma seeping out with the steam as you cut into the crispy outside. It doesn't even take very long to make, definitely my favorite dish.

b8b333a6c11c8c67.voiceContent: Any decision I make during a mission can have a profound effect on the fates of others. This is why I must always maintain a solemn respect for my position as a matra, the same way I respect knowledge and power.

10f141bd1b99e98b.voiceContent: I'm Cyno, General Mahamatra of the Akademiya. It's my duty to uphold the rules, and punish wrongdoing. I will protect you on your journey.

f6938ef427998bc7.voiceContent: Good timing, I just finished building a new deck...

ce4bdd186542b3d8.voiceContent: You play well. Let's go another round in a few minutes.

af32323f295dcb04.voiceContent: I need to edit my new deck. For my next match, I'll open like this...

44ee87a778712535.voiceContent: It's not like me to make mistakes like this...

0184ec716e972914.voiceContent: Agh... This is for me? ...Are you sure?

188222965cb04b9a.voiceContent: Tastes great. You have my gratitude.
